attributes.action: For anyone that abuses and kills children to get life without parole
attributes.background: Stronger prison sentence for people that abuse and kill children.They should get life with out parole. there so many children dying from abuse and suffering. If there were stronger sentence people might take it more seriously. Stop abuse&children dying! Something needs to be done!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602482
